diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Cholangitis due to biliary obstruction secondary to cholangiocarcinoma
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: Patient presented with worsening jaundice, fever, and anorexia, alongside a history of recently diagnosed cholangiocarcinoma and biliary stent placement. An ultrasound showed marked intrahepatic biliary ductal dilatation and a distended gallbladder, supporting the diagnosis of cholangitis.
